page.title: 17 THE ROYAL PHILANTHROPIC
page.content: The{Philanthropic School}is where boys go if their parent/s are in trouble with the law,or,if the boy himself is in trouble.When it first started the Philanthropic was very big,but now it's only half the size.The foundation stone on the chapel was laid by{Prince Albert}in the mid nineteenth century. Most of the boys stay for two to three years.They live in dormitories, fifteen boys in each house. It is really like a boarding school because they do school work like us. They also play sports,go canoeing in Merstham and Cornwall and play golf with{Mr.Henry},one of the staff. The staff try very hard to make sure that the boys feel at home and try to give them all the things they miss in their own homes.
